data.title: REV'IT!
data.meta_description: INSPIRING PEOPLE TO RIDE SINCE 1995 It was in 1995 when Ivan Vos decided it was time to create his own brand of motorcycle clothing. At that time, he was managing a company importing motorcycle gear in The Netherlands, and he saw that there were only two types of motorcycle gear available on the market: low priced it
data.text:
NOTE: Due to manufacturer restrictions, this item cannot be shipped to addresses outside of Canada

Next-generation, 2-layer jacket for adventure riding in any type of weather.

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

The Stratum (which means layers of rock) GTX motorcycle jacket is our next-generation adventure motorcycle jacket that consists of two outer shells. The base outer shell is comprised of air mesh with built-in protectors and on top of that, a GORE-TEX waterproof outer shell can be used during rides in cold or wet weather. This new two-layer system provides maximum versatility and comfort in any season or any weather conditions.

During rides in Spring/Summer or warmer temperatures, the class AA CE-certified air mesh layer will keep you cool and comfortable; allowing air to flow toward the body. The air mesh motorcycle jacket is equipped with our position-adjustable CE-level 2 SEEFLEX protectors at the elbows as well as a CE-level 2 SEESOFT back protector. An extra upgrade can easily be made by adding our CE-Level 1 chest protectors. The detachable kidney belt provides stability and protection to the lower back area. Additionally, a hydration bag can be fitted in the pocket around back.

When the weather takes a turn for the worse or for when you’re intentionally riding in colder and wet climates, the waterproof 3L GTX laminated shell can be added on top of the air mesh motorcycle jacket, providing maximum waterproofing and weather protection. This waterproof shell is level B CE-certified and combined with the AA Air mesh layer it offers the highest level of protection in our adventure collection. Ventilation zippers on the front, back, and upper arms will direct airflow to your body when the sun is beaming down. The detachable hood - which protects your neck against the elements during riding - can be stored in the XL back pocket when not needed.

Take on any adventure in any weather with the Stratum GTX motorcycle jacket.

COMFORT FEATURES

Adjustability:

Adjustable elbow protection

Adjustment drawcord at hem

Adjustment drawcord at waist

Adjustment tab at cuffs

Adjustment tab at lower arm

elasticated cuff

Elasticated waist

Pockets:

Sleeve pocket

Slit pocket at back

Slit pocket at chest

Two inner pockets

Two slit pockets on front

Two waterproof inner pockets

Two waterproof slit pockets on front

XL storage pocket

Lining:

3D mesh

Mesh

Features:

Adjustment drawcord at hood

Detachable hood

Detachable kidney belt

Double front zipper

External hang loop

Short connection zipper

Soft edge at collar

Stretchable cuff

Stretch at back

Stretch at elbows

Stretch at shoulders

TIZIP® waterproof front zipper

CLIMATE FEATURES

Waterproofing:

3L GORE-TEX fabric

Ventilation:

Panels inside arms

Ventilation panel behind center front zipper

Ventilation panels on back

Zipper at center front

Zipper at upper back

Zippers on upper arms

PROTECTION FEATURES

Protection:

3D mesh protector pockets

Prepared for SEESOFT™ CE-level 1 Divided Insert Chest Protector

Protective print at elbows

SEEFLEX™ CE-level 2 Elbow Protectors

SEEFLEX™ CE-level 2 Shoulder Protectors

SEESOFT AIR CE Level 2 on back

Thumb loops

Outer shell material:

3L GORE-TEX nylon 400D fabric

3L GORE-TEX Pro Armacor fabric

3L nylon 200D GORE-TEX fabric

Neoprene

Polyester mesh

PWR|Shell mesh

PWR|Shell ripstop stretch

PWR|Shell stretch

Visibility:

Laminated reflection at front

Laminated reflection at upper arms

Laminated reflection on back

Laminated reflection on hood

Laminated reflective logo on back

NOTE: Due to manufacturer restrictions, this item cannot be shipped to addresses outside of Canada.

It’s a daunting task when trying to improve upon the pinnacle motorcycle jacket of our adventure collection, but we made it happen. The Dominator 3 GTX motorcycle jacket has enhanced ventilation, waterproofing, and refinements to every element of the construction to upgrade performance and comfort for the rider. The fully waterproof motorcycle jacket features the tried and tested 3L GORE-TEX laminate with an updated, clean design. The detachable storm collar - which protects the neck of the rider against the elements - can be stored in the back pocket when not needed.

The stretch cuffs are also detachable and will block cold air trying to flow into the sleeves of the motorcycle jacket. In higher temperatures, airflow to the body is improved by redesigned VCS|Zippers at the upper and lower arms while our patented VCS|Aquadefence panels on the chest cool down the upper body. The 3L GORE-TEX Pro reinforced Armacor fabric is used on the shoulders for extra abrasion resistance and durability. Protection is solidified by our award-winning SEEFLEX CE-level 2 armor at the shoulders and elbows and the SEESOFT CE-level 2 back protector. The motorcycle jacket is prepared for our SEESOFT CE-level 1 divided chest protectors. The detachable kidney belt provides stability and protection to the lower back area.

Go ahead, travel anywhere, anytime with the Dominator GTX motorcycle jacket. Your next adventure awaits.

NOTE: Due to manufacturer restrictions, this item cannot be shipped to addresses outside of Canada.

NOTE: Due to manufacturer restrictions, this item cannot be shipped to addresses outside of Canada.

A top-spec, waterproof, CORIUM+® laminated leather/textile jacket for multi-season on-road touring.

The Valve H2O is our fully loaded touring jacket prepared for asphalt adventures in any season. Thanks to the combination of waterproof CORIUM+® leather on the arms and the breathable 3L CORIUM+® textile laminate on the body of the motorcycle jacket, you are always fully protected from the elements. A detachable thermal liner will keep you warm while riding in colder temperatures. And to improve your comfort level even more, we added a detachable storm collar to keep away the wind and rain from your neck.

When the temperatures start to rise while riding, you can easily direct cool air to your upper body with the help of our VCS|Aquadefence ventilation system. Just open up the flaps on the chest and secure them with the magnetic Fidlock® system. All of this can be done with one hand while riding. By opening the ventilation zippers on the back, the warm air from inside the jacket can easily escape, helping to keep your upper body at the ideal temperature.

Rain or shine, cold or warm, it doesn’t really matter. The Valve H2O motorcycle jacket will get you to your destination in comfort.

Want to add a back protector to your jacket? Click here to determine which size you'll need and to add to your shopping cart.

NOTE: Due to manufacturer restrictions, this item cannot be shipped to addresses outside of Canada.

The Defender 3 GTX is designed for those who dream of exploring uncharted horizons and don't stop until they’ve fulfilled that dream. No matter what weather types you might encounter while chasing that dream, the Defender Pro GTX will help keep you going thanks to the detachable waterproof liner with a 3L GORE-TEX membrane. This waterproof motorcycle jacket is also equipped with a removable thermal liner for rides in colder weather. If you are looking for a motorcycle jacket with ample ventilation features, look no further because this motorcycle jacket has plenty of options to regulate the amount of airflow to your body.

Next to the VCS|Ventilation panels on the front and the multiple zippers on the arm and back, the motorcycle jacket also comes with a main front zipper that can be zipped open to reveal a mesh ventilation panel that directs a cool flow of air onto your body. With all the ventilation panels and zippers open, a lot of air will flow through the entire motorcycle jacket keeping you cool during rides in high temperatures. No matter what road you take - if there even is a road - this motorcycle jacket will keep you safe thanks to the SEEFLEX CE-level 2 protectors (at the shoulders and elbows) combined with the highly abrasion-resistant outer shell that is partly constructed with the rugged ripstop material.

To increase the abrasion resistance on the high impact areas of the outer shell, we added a protective multi-layer print to the elbow area as an additional layer of protection. It also comes prepared for the SEESOFT CE-level 2 back protector and our SEESOFT CE-level 1 divided chest protectors. If you want to upgrade even further, you can connect our Segur neck brace to the connection points on the jacket. There is plenty of space to store your essential belongings in the two front pockets, big rear pocket and two inner pockets. We also added a left sleeve pocket for easy access to payment cards or toll tickets without taking your gloves off. The front pockets can be closed with zippers to make sure your valuable possessions will stay put and will arrive together with you at your destination.

With our fully loaded versatile, do-it-all Defender 3 GTX jacket you can fulfil your dreams and explore the uncharted in any weather that nature throws your way.

Want to add a back protector to your jacket? Click here to determine which size you'll need and to add to your shopping cart.

NOTE: Due to manufacturer restrictions, this item cannot be shipped to addresses outside of Canada.

Description

For many years, the Sand outfit has been the go-to choice for female riders looking for a rugged and versatile jacket and pants combination that is fully prepared to take on any challenging adventure on or off-road. Hot, wet, or cold weather will not stop you from reaching your destination, wherever the road may lead you. The Sand 4 H2O Ladies is the ultimate women’s adventure riding jacket. The tough yet lightweight, abrasion-resistant outer shell is engineered to last a multitude of around-the-world trips and is designed to provide excellent freedom of movement for the most demanding and technical riding situations. For maximum impact protection, the Sand 4 H2O Ladies includes our award-winning, industry-leading SEEFLEX™ CE-level 2 protectors at the shoulders and elbows. It also comes prepared for the optional and equally impressive SEESOFT™ CE-level 2 insert back protector. You’re ready to tackle any challenge with this jacket. When we say the Sand 4 H2O Ladies jacket is versatile, we mean that it is prepared for any climate you might encounter, and that it allows you to configurate it in the best possible way to ensure maximum comfort. Every layer is removable and separately wearable, from the waterproof hydratex® membrane to the insulated winter lining. Changing seasons or weather conditions won’t deter you from getting on your bike, you’re ready for it all. Multiple adjustment straps and tabs on the arms, and variable height adjustment straps at the waist will ensure the perfect fit to your body with or without the liners installed. If you are looking for airflow, this jacket has plenty of options that allow you to regulate the amount of wind that blows towards your body. The main front zipper can be zipped open to reveal a mesh ventilation panel that enables cool air to travel into the jacket. At the front, we have 2 ventilation panels which can be held open by a special tab connected to a press button on the outside of the jacket. With all 3 front ventilation panels open, in combination with the 2 rear-vent zippers, they will create an incredible amount of airflow through the entire jacket. Combined with the multiple ventilation zippers running across the arms, this jacket will keep you cool and comfortable in higher temperatures. The 2 front pockets, big rear pocket and 2 inner pockets provide ample storage space so you can bring all your essentials along for the ride, and keep them close. The back pocket is even large enough to store the liners when not in use. All the outside pockets can be closed with zippers to make sure you will not lose your valuable possessions during the ride. Durable, versatile and practical. The highest specifications regarding tear, cut and abrasion resistance and top-notch impact armor. The Sand 4 H2O Ladies jacket has it all and is ready for your next ride around the world.

Want to add a back protector to your jacket? Click here to determine which size you'll need and to add to your shopping cart.

NOTE: Due to manufacturer restrictions, this item cannot be shipped to addresses outside of Canada.

Description

For many years, the Sand outfit has been the go-to choice for riders looking for a rugged and versatile jacket and pants combination that is fully prepared to take on any challenging adventure on or off-road. Hot, wet, or cold weather will not stop you from reaching your destination, wherever the road may lead you. This jacket will take you anywhere in style and total comfort. Meet the 4th generation of this iconic piece. Meet the Sand 4 H2O jacket. The tough yet lightweight, abrasion-resistant outer shell is engineered to last a multitude of around-the-world trips and is designed to provide excellent freedom of movement for the most demanding and technical riding situations.

For maximum impact protection, the Sand 4 H2O includes our award-winning, industry-leading SEEFLEX™ CE-level 2 protectors at the shoulders and elbows. It also comes prepared for the optional and equally impressive SEESOFT™ CE-level 2 insert back protector. You’re ready to tackle any challenge with this jacket. When we say the Sand 4 H2O jacket is versatile, we mean that it is prepared for any climate you might encounter, and that it allows you to configurate it in the best possible way to ensure maximum comfort. Every layer is removable and separately wearable, from the waterproof hydratex® membrane to the insulated winter lining. Changing seasons or weather conditions won’t deter you from getting on your bike, you’re ready for it all. Multiple adjustment straps and tabs on the arms, and variable height adjustment straps at the waist will ensure the perfect fit to your body with or without the liners installed.

If you are looking for airflow, this jacket has plenty of options that allow you to regulate the amount of wind that blows towards your body. It features 3 ventilation panels on the front, 4 ventilation zippers on the arms, and 2 exhaust vents zipper on the back. The 2 front pockets, big rear pocket, and 2 inner pockets provide ample storage space so you can bring all your essentials along for the ride and keep them close. The back pocket is even large enough to store the liners when not in use. All the outside pockets can be closed with zippers to make sure you won’t lose your valuable possessions during the ride. Durable, versatile, and practical.

The highest specifications regarding tear, cut and abrasion-resistance and top-notch impact armor. The Sand 4 H2O jacket has it all and is ready for your next ride around the world.

Want to add a back protector to your jacket? Click here to determine which size you'll need and to add to your shopping cart.

Adjustability

Adjustable elbow protection: The adjustable elbow protection pockets allow you to tailor the CE-rated elbow protection to three different heights to perfectly fit your body and for optimal comfort while riding.

Adjustment drawcord at hem

Adjustment strap at lower arm

Adjustment tab at cuffs

Adjustment tab at upper arm

Flexisnap at collar: The REV’IT! flexisnap makes it possible to adjust the collar circumference easily and personalize its fit to each rider. A jacket is often worn in more then one season, and the flexisnap makes it possible to adjust the collar within seconds. During winter a wider collar circumference accommodates combining the jacket with a balaclava or wind collar, while during summer, a wider circumference lets an all-important cooling wind into the collar.

Variable height adjustment straps at waist

Storage

Inner pocket within thermal liner: The internal pocket within the thermal liner allows for additional storage and for riders to keep personal items close.

Two inner pockets

Two waterproof stash pockets at waist

Waterproof inner pocket within waterproof liner: The internal pocket within the waterproof liner is waterproof.

Waterproof stash pocket on back

Lining

3D mesh

Features

Long connection zipper

Prepared for REV’IT! Segur neck brace

Prepared for vest connector NEON: The Vest connector NEON allows you to the upgrade your jacket with a vest that quickly and easily attaches. The highly visible vest offers enhanced safety.

Separately wearable hydratex®|Lite liner

Short connection zipper

Short connection zipper in detachable waterproof liner: Adding to the versatility of the waterproof detachable liner, it comes with a short connection zipper, allowing you to securely fasten it to your riding trousers (or jeans via the Safeway 2 belts), when possible.

Soft edge at collar: For extra comfort, the inside of the collar is covered with a soft fabric.

Two-way Collar Snap Closure System

NOTE: Due to manufacturer restrictions, this item cannot be shipped to addresses outside of Canada.

Highly ventilated and rugged jacket for on and off-road adventure riding in high temperatures.

Meet the Cayenne 2 motorcycle jacket. It’s our purpose-built, top-spec, hot-weather adventure jacket for those driven to break all boundaries. This jacket has been constructed with the strongest mesh fabrics prominently located at the front and back and under the arms of the jacket. This allows for ample air to freely flow through the jacket and cool you down while riding in rising temperatures. The highest level of impact protection is provided by our CE-level 2 SEEFLEX shoulder and elbow protectors and SEESOFT AIR back protector.

This motorcycle jacket is prepared for our SEESOFT chest protectors as well. Additionally, it comes equipped with connection loops to connect our Segur neck brace to it. To keep the right fluids flowing through your body during your ride, we constructed a pocket for a hydration bag into the back of the jacket. To top it off, we added a detachable kidney belt with a secret pocket designed for change and a spare credit card. This jacket has been created for on and off-road travelers looking for an extremely rugged yet ventilated garment with top-level armor, plenty of storage, and ample adjustment possibilities.

If this is you, then look no further. You’ve found what you’re looking for.

This garment is certified according to the EN 17092 Standard, published in 2020 and has achieved AA rating. For more details about certification click here.

NOTE: Due to manufacturer restrictions, this item cannot be shipped to addresses outside of Canada.

Versatile all-season jacket for adventure riding

Adventure will take you wherever it may, but you still want to feel in control, even on unknown roads and through uncharted terrains. That’s why your motorcycle jacket should be a versatile companion – making your every mile safe, comfortable, and composed. So, if you’re looking for an all-season all-rounder, the Offtrack 2 H2O’s for you. Now you’re dressed to be in control of every adventure. Versatile line-up Confidence-inspiring design puts the focus on your unfolding adventure. When it’s hot out in the wild, well-proportioned VCS|Aquadefence panels increase airflow, while zippers on the forearms and back ventilate your upper body. Should the temperature drop, just zip the detachable thermal liner into the PWR|Shell, PWR|Ripstop outer. And in adverse weather, switch to the hydratex liner to stay dry. The thermal liner & removable waterproof liner are both separate wearable stand-alone jackets. The waterproof liner is also wearable over the top of the outer shell jacket, making the 100% waterproof WL the outermost layer for extreme wet weather conditions. One jacket, three modes; all the versatility. Explore safe Knowing your jacket is keeping you safe helps you enjoy the thrill of adventure riding – that’s the thinking behind the Offtrack H2O jacket. It’s also why it’s equipped with SEEFLEX CE-rated protection at the shoulders and elbows, plus the option of SEESOFT protectors for your back and chest.

Fashionable city jacket with high end features

Designed for year-round rides on two wheels

Stays dry and lightweight due to a laminated shell

On-demand airflow via VCS|aquadefence ventilation

When the development process started for the Trench GTX, our aim was to create a fashionable city jacket with all the functional and protective features you normally find only in high-end touring jackets. It would be a jacket designed for long-distance, metropolitan commuters that ride 365 days a year on two wheels, in any type of weather imaginable. Mission: Accomplished.

The laminated GORE-TEX® outer shell is extremely breathable and, as you would expect, 100% waterproof. Being a laminated outer shell, the water pick-up is virtually non-existent, so the jacket stays dry and lightweight all the time. This plays a huge role in preventing hypothermia during winter or colder rides. When used without the included thermal liner, there’s an unsurpassed breathability making this jacket comfortable to wear in warmer conditions. Thus, you have here an almost four-season jacket, with the exception of extreme heat.

Unparalleled, on-demand airflow is provided by our patented VCS|aquadefence ventilation system, conveniently positioned at the chest, yet nicely integrated into the design. Hot and humid air that could potentially get trapped inside the jacket can easily escape through the air outlet vents around back. In terms of protection, the Trench GTX jacket has got it all. SEEFLEX™ CE-level 2 armor is found at the elbows and shoulders, and it’s also prepared for the SEESOFT™ CE-level 2 back protector.

Versatile waterproof multi-season mesh jacket for adventure riding in various weather conditions.

For those who don’t want to choose between a waterproof or a mesh motorcycle jacket for their adventures, the Levante 2 jacket is the silver-bullet solution. This versatile multi-season jacket has all the features you need for riding in the spring, summer, or fall. Waterproofing is provided by the easily removable hydratex|Lite liner that can be stored in the back pocket when not in use and can be worn underneath or on top of the outer shell. With the liner removed, cool air can easily flow through the jacket thanks to the big mesh panels on the front, back, and arms.

Warm weather is no match for this motorcycle jacket! Big storage pockets at the front and back will allow you to bring your essentials along for the ride. The Levante 2 H2O comes fully equipped with SEEFLEX CE-level 2 approved armor at the shoulders and elbows and is prepared for our SEESOFT back and chest protectors. Various adjustment tabs and straps will ensure a perfect fit to your body.

Go ahead and take off on a new adventure, the versatile Levante 2 H2O motorcycle jacket will keep you comfortable and protected during journey.

Mesh textile summer jacket for urban riding

Summers seem to last longer in the city. Hotter days and warmer nights demand a riding essential – a lightweight jacket that cools you down. But the Eclipse 2 jacket doesn’t only optimize airflow. Beneath strategically placed polyester mesh panels, there’s SEESMART armor with CE-rated protection that you can rely on. Plus, plenty of practical touches for your daily trips around town like the zipped pockets, a wind catcher behind the front zipper, and a jeans loop – all the season’s essentials. Cooler for commuters winding your way to work in rush hour, you’ll appreciate the breathable mesh panels at the front, the back, and the inner arms that send a current of air around your entire body. An abrasion-resistant 600-denier polyester construction adds a sense of secure comfort, plus you can customize the fit with tabs at the waist, cuffs, and bicep. Pump up the protection Eclipse 2 has evolved. Now there's SEESMART CE-Level 1 armor at the elbows and shoulders. You can up your level even higher with the SEESOFT CE-Level 2 back protector to offer inconspicuous yet highly effective impact resistance. So, when you’re whizzing about town you can feel pumped about protection, not weighed down by it.

Laminated and ventilated GORE-TEX pants for serious adventure riders.

Take on any adventure, no matter where you are, with RE'VITs top-of-the-line, waterproof Dominator 3 GTX pants. They feature the premium 3L GORE-TEX laminate which is guaranteed to keep you dry. Reinforced Armacor fabric at the knee area improves durability and abrasion resistance in case you find yourself battling it out with local shrubbery off-road or in case you make contact on the road. The comfort level of these pants in cold and wet weather have been upgraded significantly thanks to the addition of a detachable bib. The bib forms a protective barrier against cold air and moisture which prevents the cooling down of the upper body.

Ensuring your personal items remain close by, these pants now have more storage options thanks to the addition of cargo pockets at the upper legs. During rides in higher temperatures, airflow to the legs is facilitated by our patented VCS|Aquadefence panels that can easily be opened with or without gloves on, and while riding. Armor is provided by SEEFLEX CE-level 2 knee protection and the pants also include the thin and breathable SEESMART CE-level 1 hip protectors.

Enjoy all the road, or road less traveled, has to offer with the multi-season, multi-faceted Dominator 3 GTX pants.

3L GORE-TEX Pro

The 3-layer (3L) GORE-TEX PRO design utilizes a revolutionary membrane that is specially processed and provides high strength. The membrane is durably bonded to both the rugged outer material and a specially developed robust inner lining. GORE-TEX PRO garments are highly abrasion- and snag-resistant. The 3-layer GORE-TEX PRO laminates also benefit from our Tricot Backer technology. The specially woven lining protects the membrane also from abrasion on the inside and adds to the extreme robustness of the 3-layer laminate system.

NOTE: Due to manufacturer restrictions, this item cannot be shipped to addresses outside of Canada.

Top-spec, waterproof, CORIUM+® laminated leather/textile pants for multi-season on-road touring.

Take on any asphalt adventure in any weather with the high-tech and versatile Valve H2O motorcycle pants. We took our time when it came to the design of the Valve H2O pants; to make sure they were created and suitable for all-season riding. Thanks to the combination of waterproof CORIUM+® leather on the hips, knees, and rear and the breathable 3L hydratex waterproof laminate on the body of the pants, you are always fully protected from bad weather.

A detachable thermal liner will keep you warm while riding in colder temperatures. On warmer days you can easily direct cool air to your upper legs with the help of our VCS|Aquadefence system. Just open up the flaps on the legs and secure them with the magnetic Fidlock® system. All of this can be done with one hand, with gloves on, while riding. Don’t compromise comfort and protection during your next touring adventure.

The Valve H2O motorcycle pants will keep fully protected from the elements during every minute of your adventure tour ride, and help to keep you safe at the same time.

NOTE: Due to manufacturer restrictions, this item cannot be shipped to addresses outside of Canada.

All-climate adventure travel pants with removable thermal and GORE-TEX liners.

When you start traveling, you create new experiences that sometimes go far beyond your imagination. We want to make sure you can fully enjoy these moments by keeping you as comfortable and protected as possible. That is why we designed Defender 3 GTX pants. They’re a versatile pair of rugged pair of pants that are prepared to take on any weather type you may encounter out on the road. To keep you comfortable in cold and wet weather, we equipped them with a removable 3-layer GORE-TEX waterproof liner, along with a removable thermal liner for insulation in colder temperatures.

The outer shell is equipped with stretch inserts above the knee and under the waist to increase freedom of movement during active riding on or off the road. When the temperature starts to rise while riding, you can easily open the VCS|Ventilation panels on the upper legs and secure them using the magnetic Fidlock® closure. By opening the exhaust vent on the rear of the pocket, you will create a steady flow of air through the pants keeping your upper legs cool and comfortable. Under the rugged outer shell constructed of ripstop material, we installed SEESMART CE-Level 1 hip protectors and height-adjustable SEEFLEX CE-level 2 knee protectors. To increase the abrasion resistance on the high-impact areas of the outer shell we added a protective, multi-layer print to the knee area.

There are ample storage points so you can bring your essentials including two waterproof slit pockets at the waist and waterproof pockets on the upper legs. These side pockets are equipped with zippers to make sure your belongings stay inside, where they belong. To get the perfect fit to your body you can adjust the straps at the waist and calves. With the hook-and-loop closures on the calves, you can adjust these pants to fit with any motorcycle boots you can think of. Furthermore, these pants are equipped with grip panels at the seat, long and short connection zippers, and reflection on the calves; all incorporated to keep you comfortable and safe when on the road or trails.

No matter the weather, with the versatile and rugged Defender 3 GTX pants you are fully prepared to experience your next adventure to the fullest.

NOTE: Due to manufacturer restrictions, this item cannot be shipped to addresses outside of Canada.

Description

The Sand 4 H2O Ladies are an incredibly versatile pair of female-specific riding pants that will enable the most adventurous riders out there to explore the best roads and trails of the world on two wheels, in any environment, in any season. The Sand 4 H2O Ladies pants sport the same Swiss Army Knife-like versatility as the jacket when it comes to features. From the outside in, you will find a highly abrasion-resistant but lightweight outer shell equipped with height adjustable SEEFLEX™ CE-level 2 knee and CE-level 1 SEESMART™ hip protectors. Underneath the rugged outer shell, there’s the detachable, breathable waterproof hydratex® liner that will keep you comfortable and dry in wet conditions. To top it all off - and allow you to challenge colder conditions - we also installed a snug removable thermal liner. With both liners removed, you can direct air to your legs by opening the VCS zippers located next to the waterproof stash pockets, which provide plenty of storage space for your essentials. Zippers on the pockets make sure that your possessions stay where they should be. Adjustment straps on hips ensure a perfect fit to your body with or without liners installed. The adjustment straps and tabs on the calves and ankles make sure the fit can be adjusted to use the pants with any type of motorcycle boot. Thanks to the grip panel around back, the Sand 4 H2O Ladies pants prevent you from sliding on the seat under acceleration or braking. Laminated reflection on the calves ensures you remain visible in the dark. Go further.
